title: The Catch Up button appears on the Feed Select popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps: WHEN we select any LIVE game tile AND the Feed Select overlay appears AND we select one of the video feeds
custom_expected: THEN the option for Catch Up will appear

title: Selecting the Catch Up button brings the user to the Catch Up video clips
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps: WHEN we select any LIVE game tile AND the Feed Select overlay appears AND we select one of the video feeds AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the Catch Up video clip

title: NOT SPONSORED: Catch Up card appears correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps:
WHEN we select any LIVE game tile
 AND the Feed Select overlay appears
 AND we select one of the video feeds
 AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button
 AND the user is taken to the Catch Up video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the Catch Up video info card appears on the right side of the screen
AND the mugshot of the Player appears correctly
AND the game score is accurate and up to date
AND the play info appears correctly and accurately describes the highlight
AND the SKIP PLAY button appears 
AND the GO LIVE button appears

title: SPONSORED: Catch Up card appears correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps:
WHEN we select any LIVE game tile
AND the Feed Select overlay appears 
AND we select one of the video feeds 
AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button 
AND the user is taken to the Catch Up video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the Catch Up video info card appears on the right side of the screen 
AND the mugshot of the Player appears correctly 
AND the game score is accurate and up to date 
AND the play info appears correctly and accurately describes the highlight 
AND the SKIP PLAY button appears 
AND the GO LIVE button appears 
AND a sponsor button does appear.

title: Catch Up video plays and functions correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps:
WHEN we select any LIVE game tile 
AND the Feed Select overlay appears 
AND we select one of the video feeds 
AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button 
AND the user is taken to the Catch Up video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the Catch Up video plays correctly 
AND trick play functionality is disabled

title: User can jump to LIVE while watching a Catch Up video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps:
WHEN we select any LIVE game tile 
AND the Feed Select overlay appears 
AND we select one of the video feeds 
AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button 
AND the user is taken to the Catch Up video feed 
AND the user selects the GO LIVE button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the LIVE game

title: User is taken to LIVE after all Catch Up videos play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
AND a LIVE game is available
custom_steps:
WHEN we select any LIVE game tile 
AND the Feed Select overlay appears 
AND we select one of the video feeds 
AND when the user selects the Catch Up feed button 
AND the user is taken to the Catch Up video feed 
AND the user watches all available Catch Up videos (could be 1-4 video clips)
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the LIVE game
